column5: Create a backup plan for %s. A backup plan lets you specify which parts of your cluster to back up, when to create backups, and where to store them. [Learn more](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/add-on/backup-for-gke/concepts/backup-for-gke).

Configure maintenance window for cluster cluster-1 to let auto-upgrades run during off-peak hours and when someone is available to handle unforeseen issues. [Learn how](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/how-to/maintenance-windows-and-exclusions).
